parameters.name: DBInstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the instance.

parameters.name: DbType
parameters.description:
The architecture of the instance. Valid values:

*   **normal**: replica set instance
*   **sharding**: sharded cluster instance

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The database engine version of the instance.

parameters.name: InstanceChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **PrePaid** (default): subscription
*   **PostPaid**: pay-as-you-go

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the latest available regions.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description:
The storage type of the instance. Valid values:

- **local_ssd**: local SSD 
- **cloud_essd1**: PL1 enhanced SSD (ESSD) 
- **cloud_essd2**: PL2 ESSD 
- **cloud_essd3**: PL3 ESSD 
- **cloud_auto**: ESSD AutoPL 

By default, this parameter is empty, which indicates that all types of storage resources are queried.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The ID of the zone. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the available zones.
